content: {A挠头}Feel free to keep placing furniture and decorations within the blueprint.

content: <style=NpcName>Glenn</style> just got a batch of nice furniture in stock. Go visit his shop and take a look. If there's anything else you need, do let me know.

content: {A远眺}Hoho! The Twin Crescent Chairs look splendid at night. <style=PlayerName>{me}</style>, do you feel like adding more decorations?
